> The aim of philosophy is to understand how things, in the broadest possible 
> sense of the term, hang together, in the broadest possible sense of the term.  

— [Philosophy and the Scientific Image of Man](/docs/phil/works/Philosophy and the Scientific Image of Man.html) §37
